sect2.title: Installation of SPIRV-LLVM-Translator

note.para: This tarball is v&spirv-llvm-translator-version;.tar.gz. v&spirv-llvm-translator-version;.tar.gz will extract to the directory SPIRV-LLVM-Translator-&spirv-llvm-translator-version;.

sect2.para: Install SPIRV-LLVM-Translator by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -D CMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_RPATH=ON \ -D BUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \ -D LLVM_EXTERNAL_SPIRV_HEADERS_SOURCE_DIR=/usr \ -G Ninja .. &&
ninja

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: ninja test.

sect2.title: 32-bit Installation of SPIRV-LLVM-Translator
sect2.para: Install lib32-SPIRV-LLVM-Translator by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
CC="gcc -m32" CXX="g++ -m32" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib32/pkgconfig \ cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -D CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib32 \ -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -D CMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_RPATH=ON \ -D BUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \ -D LLVM_EXTERNAL_SPIRV_HEADERS_SOURCE_DIR=/usr \ -G Ninja .. &&
ninja
DESTDIR=$PWD/DESTDIR ninja install cp -vr DESTDIR/usr/lib32/* /usr/lib32 rm -rf DESTDIR ldconfig

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -D BUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON: This switch forces the build system to install shared libraries instead of static libraries.

-D LLVM_EXTERNAL_SPIRV_HEADERS_*: These switches tells the build system that is installed in /usr. This is needed since the build system tries to download and use the downloaded headers not on the system if the switch isn't invoked.
